title: 2022 Week 5 Preview: Game Picks and Locks of the Week
itunes:title: 2022 Week 5 Preview: Game Picks and Locks of the Week
description:
A room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Gregg Rosenthal preview all the games on the Week 5 slate, starting with the primetime matchups: Bengals at Ravens (3:49), Raiders at Chiefs (10:46), and the Giants-Packers game in London (16:51). Then, we begin the draft with Cowboys at Rams (23:25) and preview the rest of the games: Eagles at Cardinals (30:55), Steelers at Bills (36:57), Dolphins at Jets (40:56), Chargers at Browns (48:21), Seahawks at Saints (52:55), Lions at Patriots (57:18), Falcons at Buccaneers (1:02:44), Titans at Commanders (1:09:43), 49ers at Panthers (1:15:37), Texans at Jaguars (1:20:44), and Bears at Vikings (1:23:59). Each of the heroes makes their lock of the week pick, including a visit from the Cincinnati Zoo.

Note: timecodes approximate.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
